long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spider-Man - Miles Morales Live Wallpaper: Bring Marvel’s Hero to Your Chrome Tabs

Enter the universe of Spider-Man - Miles Morales with this captivating live wallpaper extension. Designed to transform your new tab experience, this minimalist Chrome extension offers animated backgrounds, easy navigation, and essential tools for Marvel fans and Chrome users alike.

Features:

4K Live Wallpaper: Each new tab features breathtaking, animated Miles Morales wallpapers in crystal-clear 4K resolution.

Quick Site Shortcuts: Access your go-to sites instantly with customizable shortcuts.

Google Search Bar: Search Google directly from your new tab page for added convenience.

With Spider-Man - Miles Morales Live Wallpaper, bring the excitement of Marvel’s iconic hero to every Chrome tab. Experience the action-packed visuals of Miles Morales as you browse, complemented by an easy-to-use interface and essential tools. Perfect for adding both Marvel style and functionality to your browsing experience, this extension ensures that each tab feels dynamic and personal.
